casebody.data:
Alice Ferraro, Trustee for Rose Hill Associates v. St. Vincent dePaul Society of Waterbury, Inc. (11226)

Foti, Lavery and Schaller, Js.

Argued January 14 — decision released February 9, 1993 Mark Fitzhugh Lee, with whom, on the brief, was Debra Zappone, for the appellant (defendant). Eugene S. Melchionne, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
